# osu-Beatmap-Request-Module
(IF YOU ARE PLAYING ON LAZER, I'M SORRY. THIS BOT IS NOT WORKING ON LAZER FOR NOW)
<br/>
Join my Discord server if you want to ask about something : **[Join Here](https://discord.gg/RT5eC26qYa)** (Mostly Indonesian)

## Preparation
Here's a list of all software that needs to be installed before you download the bot.

### Software to install:
A. [Streamer.bot](https://streamer.bot/)
   1. Open the software, go to:
      > Platform>Youtube>**Account**
      
      or
      > Platform>Twitch>**Account**
      
      And login on **Broadcaster Accout** (If you have your own bot account, login on the **Bot Account** too)
   2. After you login, go to Import and put this text:
      ```
      
      ```
      And click **Import**
   4. You're good to go


## Installation
1. Download .exe file from [Release](https://github.com/MineFrostID/osu-beatmap-request-module/releases/latest)
2. Open it

## Streamer.bot Config

### Actions / Commands Setting
- Make sure Actions is enabled
- Make sure command is enabled

## How to use (For Streamer)
A. osu! request module app
1. Open osu-beatmap-request-module app
2. Click the link inside terminal to login
3. Authorize with your osu! account
4. Go back to terminal, click another link to get legacy api
5. Get your server password
6. Type the server password into terminal
7. You're done
8. Credential will save locally on the first run

B. Streamer.bot
1. Open Streamer.bot app
2. Enabled all the actions and command for osu! Request
3. That's it

### NOTE FOR YOUTUBE STREAMER
Make a new stream schedule and GO LIVE (Streamer.bot will not work if you don't have a live stream)

## How to use (For Viewer)
Use this format to request :
> !r [beatmapID] [message / mods]

You can use one of these commands :
- !r
- !req
- !request
- r!
- req!
- request!
  
For Example
- > !r 4469665
- > !r 4469665 hddt
- > !r 4469665 play this with hrhd
